MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW12 postcode area of Congleton, affecting customers in Somerford, Astbury and surrounding areas.. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.58AM. Our engineers have established that there is a fault on the underground cable network and that repairs will be complex so we are arranging generators to restore power, and this should happen by 12.30PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.06PM on 2nd January 2021.
